tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was quite an amazing visit, I loved how the practitioners treated me, clearly putting out all the available options, and the whole experience was top notch.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently visited Dr Shruti Goel and was thoroughly impressed with the experience. The clinic is impeccably clean, creating a comfortable and hygienic environment. My wait time was minimal, which I greatly appreciated. The doctor did an excellent job with the scaling and polishing of my teeth, leaving them feeling clean and spotless. Both the staff and the doctor were incredibly cordial and friendly, ensuring that I felt welcome and at ease throughout my visit. I highly recommend Dr Goel for anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my gaps filled with Bioclear veneers. The process was easily done, and I am very satisfied with my smile. Dr. Shruti and her staff are very polite and provide the best consultation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently brought my mom to Veda Dentistry for treatment for her multiple tooth problems, which had been causing her a lot of discomfort for a long time.
Dr. Shruti and her team did an exceptional job. 
Dr. Shruti's deep understanding and expertise in dealing with teeth issues were evident throughout the treatment process.
My mom received excellent care, and we're very grateful for the great work done by the entire team at Veda Dentistry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr Shruti goel for Pain in my jaw which was left undiagnosed by a lot of dentists. She diagnosed the root cause of my pain which was due to TMJ and suggested me the most economical way to treat it.
With latest diagnostic equipments she suggested me to go for a splint and laser treatment for pain associated with TMJ. 
I got immediate relief from the laser treatment and her treatment is really effective.
I recommend her to everyone who is facing any issues regarding your dental health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The most caring and personalised service one could ask for. I was anxious for my extraction and Dr. Shruthi offered  conscious sedation to make me feel relaxed. It did wonders for me and the whole process became so much less daunting and astonishingly painless. I would whole heartedly recommend Veda Dentistry to anyone who needs any treatment for their teeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently completed my braces treatment here, and I had a great experience. The staff was friendly and professional, and the doctors were very approachable. The clinic's hygiene standards were top-notch, which was reassuring. Overall, I'm happy with the service I received and would highly recommend this dental practice.
